bibliographic-data.invention-title: ELECTRONIC MEDICAL INFORMATION SYSTEM, ELECTRONIC MEDICAL INFORMATION PROGRAMS, AND COMPUTER-READABLE RECORDING MEDIA FOR STORING THE ELECTRONIC MEDICAL INFORMATION

nplcit.text: Halberg, Bruce; Kinkoph, Sherry; Ray, Bill; et al, Using Microsoft TM Excel 97, Bestseller Edition, published 1997, pp. 330, 343-345, 355-356

abstract.p: Problem The problem is to facilitate viewing of temporal correlation between patient's chief complaint and doctor's interview results associated with the patient's chief complaint. Means of Solution The temporal correlation can be viewed by providing an electronic medical information system equipped with a control server comprising an input means for inputting, among the information written on the chart, the patient's chief complaint information into a chief complaint information file and for inputting the doctor's consultation information associated with the patient's chief complaint information into a consultation information file
an accumulation means for accumulating the chief complaint information and consultation information

a calculation means for scoring, with respect to each date of consultation, the latest chief complaint information and consultation information input by the input means, and the past chief complaint information and consultation information accumulated by the accumulation means, respectively
a generation means for automatically generating, based on the scores, a list by which the temporal variation of the chief complaint information and consultation information can be viewed.

abstract.p: [Problem] The problem is to facilitate viewing of temporal correlation between patient's chief complaint and doctor's interview results associated with the patient's chief complaint. [Means of Solution] The temporal correlation can be viewed by providing an electronic medical information system equipped with a control server comprising an input means for inputting, among the information written on the chart, the patient's chief complaint information into a chief complaint information file and for inputting the doctor's consultation information associated with the patient's chief complaint information into a consultation information file
an accumulation means for accumulating the chief complaint information and consultation information

a calculation means for scoring, with respect to each date of consultation, the latest chief complaint information and consultation information input by the input means, and the past chief complaint information and consultation information accumulated by the accumulation means, respectively
a generation means for automatically generating, based on the scores, a list by which the temporal variation of the chief complaint information and consultation information can be viewed.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: MEDICAL INFORMATION COMPUTERIZED SYSTEM, PROGRAM AND MEDIUM
COMPUTERISIERTES SYSTEM FÃœR MEDIZINISCHE INFORMATIONEN, PROGRAMM UND MEDIUM
SUPPORT, PROGRAMME ET SYSTEME INFORMATISE D'INFORMATION MEDICALE
ELECTRONIC MEDICAL INFORMATION SYSTEM, ELECTRONIC MEDICAL INFORMATION PROGRAMS, AND COMPUTER-READERBLE RECORDING MEDIA FOR STORING THE ELECTRONIC MEDICAL INFORMATION PROGRAMS

abstract.p: [PROBLEMS] Time-series correlation between the chief complaint of a patient and the results of medical interview by a doctor can be seen at a glance. [MEANS FOR SOLVING PROBLEMS] A medical information computerized system having a control server is provided. The control server comprises an inputting means for inputting patient chief complaint information out of information written on a medical record into a chief complaint information file, an inputting means for inputting doctor examination information about the patient chief complaint in an examination information file, a storage means for storing the chief complaint information and the examination information, a calculating means for calculating the points, for each examination date, of the latest chief complaint and examination information both inputted by the inputting means and the points of the past chief complaints and examination information both stored in the storage means, a creating means for automatically creating, from these points, a list showing the variation with time of the chief complaint information and examination information. The medical information computerized system provides a list of the time-series correlation.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Medical information computerized system, program and medium

abstract.p: An electronic medical information system using a computer to manage electronic medical information is disclosed. The electronic medical information system is equipped with a control server. The control server comprises: an input means for inputting a patient's chief complaint information into a chief complaint information file and for inputting a doctor's consultation information associated with said patient's chief complaint information into a consultation information file
a first accumulation means for accumulating said chief complaint information and said consultation information

a calculation means for scoring, with respect to each date of consultation, the latest chief complaint information and consultation information input by said input means, and the past chief complaint information and consultation information accumulated by said accumulation means, respectively
and a generation means for automatically generating, based on the scores, a list by which a temporal variation of the chief complaint information and consultation information can be viewed.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: ELECTRONIC MEDICAL INFORMATION SYSTEM, ELECTRONIC MEDICAL INFORMATION PROGRAMS AND COMPUTER-READABLE RECORDING MEDIA FOR STORING ELECTRONIC MEDICAL INFORMATION PROGRAMS

abstract.p: FIELD: physics

computer engineering. ^ SUBSTANCE: invention relates to an electronic medical information system. Time dependency can be browsed by creating a system which is provided with a control server which has apparatus for input and output of information recorded on a card, information on complaints of a patient and consultation information recorded in the respective file, apparatus for storing information, apparatus for calculating quantitative indicators with respect to each consultation date, apparatus for generating quantitative indicators and a list, through which change in information on the main complaint and consultation information over time can be browsed. ^ EFFECT: design of an information system which generates and controls generation of medical data based on time dependency of input parametres. ^ 24 cl, 21 dwg

an accumulation means for accumulating the chief complaint information and consultation information

a calculation means for scoring, with respect to each date of consultation, the latest chief complaint information and consultation information input by the input means, and the past chief complaint information and consultation information accumulated by the accumulation means, respectively
a generation means for automatically generating, based on the scores, a list by which the temporal variation of the chief complaint information and consultation information can be viewed.

abstract.p: [PROBLEMS] Time-series correlation between the chief complaint of a patient and the results of medical interview by a doctor can be seen at a glance. [MEANS FOR SOLVING PROBLEMS] A medical information computerized system having a control server is provided. The control server comprises an inputting means for inputting patient chief complaint information out of information written on a medical record into a chief complaint information file, an inputting means for inputting doctor examination information about the patient chief complaint in an examination information file, a storage means for storing the chief complaint information and the examination information, a calculating means for calculating the points, for each examination date, of the latest chief complaint and examination information both inputted by the inputting means and the points of the past chief complaints and examination information both stored in the storage means, a creating means for automatically creating, from these points, a list showing the variation with time of the chief complaint information and examination information. The medical information computerized system provides a list of the time-series correlation.
